# Quick Look

## [Topics](/documentation/Quartz/quick-look#topics)

### [Classes](/documentation/Quartz/quick-look#Classes)

[`class QLPreviewView`](/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewView)A Quick Look preview of an item that you can embed into your view hierarchy.[`enum QLPreviewViewStyle`](/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewViewStyle)Styles for a Preview View.### [Protocols](/documentation/Quartz/quick-look#Protocols)

[`protocol QLPreviewItem`](/documentation/QuickLook/QLPreviewItem)[`protocol QLPreviewPanelDataSource`](/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanelDataSource)A protocol that the Quick Look preview panel uses to access the contents of its data source object.[`protocol QLPreviewPanelDelegate`](/documentation/QuickLookUI/QLPreviewPanelDelegate)A protocol for the delegate of the Quick Look preview panel.
